to.sven.androidrccar.host.communication.contract

Interface ISocketConnectorListener


  • public interface ISocketConnectorListener
    A listener interface for the SocketConnector to report, that a somebody has connected or an error occurred.
    Author:
    sven

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connectionEstablished(java.net.Socket socket)
      Somebody has connected
      void error(int resId, java.lang.Object... args)
      An error occurred.

      • error

        void error(int resId,
         java.lang.Object... args)
        An error occurred.
        Parameters:
        resId - A string resource Id to a error message.
        args - Some objects, that will be formatted with the string.
